SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I stay at home most of the time because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Stay at Home

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I change position frequently to try and get my back comfortable.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Change Position Frequently

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I walk more slowly than usual because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Walk More Slowly

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back, I am not doing any of the jobs that I usually do around the house.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Not Do Any Usual House Jobs

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back, I use a handrail to get upstairs.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Use Handrail to Get Upstairs

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: RDQ01-Lie Down to Rest More Often
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back, I lie down to rest more often.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Lie Down to Rest More Often

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: RDQ01-Hold on to Get Out of a Chair
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back, I have to hold on to something to get out of an easy chair.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Hold on to Get Out of a Chair

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: RDQ01-Get Other People to Do Things
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back, I try to get other people to do things for me.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Get Other People to Do Things

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I get dressed more slowly then usual because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Get Dressed More Slowly

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I only stand for short periods of time because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Only Stand for Short Periods

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: RDQ01-Try Not to Bend or Kneel
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back, I try not to bend or kneel down.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Try Not to Bend or Kneel

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: RDQ01-Difficult to Get Out of a Chair
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I find it difficult to get out of a chair because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Difficult to Get Out of a Chair

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - My back is painful almost all the time.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Painful Almost All the Time

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: RDQ01-Difficult to Turn Over in Bed
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I find it difficult to turn over in bed because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Difficult to Turn Over in Bed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - My appetite is not very good because of my back pain.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Appetite is Not Very Good

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I have trouble putting on my socks (or stockings) because of the pain in my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Trouble Putting on Socks or Stockings

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I only walk short distances because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Only Walk Short Distances

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I sleep less well because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Sleep Less Well

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back pain, I get dressed with help from someone else.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Get Dressed With Help

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: RDQ01-Sit Down Most of the Day
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I sit down for most of the day because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Sit Down Most of the Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I avoid heavy jobs around the house because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Avoid Heavy Jobs

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back pain, I am more irritable and bad tempered with people than usual.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - More Irritable With People

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - Because of my back, I go upstairs more slowly than usual.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Go Upstairs More Slowly

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - I stay in bed most of the time because of my back.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Stay in Bed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - RDQ total derived score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RDQ - Total Derived Score
